description:

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XPATH_PAREN_003` |
| **Name** | XPath parenthesis bypass with count function |
| **Category** | XPATH |
| **Subcategory** | authentication_bypass |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |
